title: Cuyahoga Valley National Park: Eating & Sleeping
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping             Eating & Sleeping         Trail Mix in Boston offers snacks, beverages and ice cream to hikers and bikers along the Towpath Trail. NPS / DJ Reiser  Eating In addition to having many restuarant choice around the perimeter of the park, there are options for dining in the Village of Peninsula. Conservancy for Cuyahoga Valley National Park operatates two retail outlets in the park known as Trail Mix Boston (open April through October) and Trail Mix Peninsula (open year round). In addition to offering locally made Mitchell's Ice Cream, snacks and a variety of beverages, Trail Mix stores will begin offering their own line of grab-and-go meal options in the Spring of 2015. Sleeping There are several camping options in and near Cuyahoga Valley National Park. In addition, many major hotel chains offer lodging options along the boundary of the park.
